item.title: Here are Friday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Netflix, Tesla, Nike, Sunrun, Amazon, Pinterest & more
item.description: Here are Friday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Citi upgrades McDonald’s to buy as fast-food giant leans into value pivot
item.description: Shares of McDonald's could rise 16% after a lackluster 2024, Citi said.

item.title: UBS upgrades this solar stock to buy, calls it a ‘clear market leader’
item.description: A second Trump administration might not necessarily present headwinds for the solar sector as investors have feared, according to UBS.

item.title: Piper Sandler upgrades Nike, says a path to recovery is emerging
item.description: Piper Sandler expects Nike to return to healthy and profitable and sales growth by the third quarter of 2026.

item.title: Goldman Sachs downgrades Advanced Micro Devices as competitive pressures intensify
item.description: Shares of Advanced Micro Devices will trade range-bound until investors gain renewed optimism about the company's future growth trajectory, Goldman Sa...
